## Description {#details}

The header preceding each entry in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> Info substream of the DBI stream.

Corresponds to the type MODI in the reference implementation.

Definition at line 212 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h">RawTypes.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

Size of C11 line number info in above stream.

<MemberDefinition

### FileNameOffs {#a0e7dbf4f560ff0eaf122d37c834078eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>support::ulittle32&#95;t llvm::pdb::ModuleInfoHeader::FileNameOffs</>}>
Array of &#91;0..NumFiles) DBI name buffer offsets.

In the reference implementation this field is a pointer. But since you can&#39;t portably serialize a pointer, on 64-bit platforms they copy all the values except this one into the 32-bit version of the struct and use that for serialization. Regardless, this field is unused, it is only there to store a pointer that can be accessed at runtime.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h/#l00249">249</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h">RawTypes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Mod {#afcc7609271d4cadbb41a08dd7a51457a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>support::ulittle32&#95;t llvm::pdb::ModuleInfoHeader::Mod</>}>
Currently opened module.

This field is a pointer in the reference implementation, but that won&#39;t work on 64-bit systems, and anyway it doesn&#39;t make sense to read a pointer from a file. For now it is unused, so just ignore it.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h/#l00217">217</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/include/llvm/debuginfo/pdb/native/rawtypes-h">RawTypes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
